description: Jake Porter’s new client, Peter Pounder, isn’t really feeling the property he’s been shown. It’s up to the charming, boyish, real estate hottie to make a good impression and close the deal. He starts by sucking on Peter’s toes and sending sensations up and down the lean, chiseled, hunk’s body. Peter is so worked up, all he can think about is pounding Jake’s ass and creaming all over him in what will hopefully be his new house.
title: Always Be Closing Part 3
